bibl.title: Letter from Robert C. Gooch to Philip Showalter Hench, May 6, 1941

div1.p: Gooch informs Hench that the information he requested is available at the Library of Congress.

div1.head: Letter from Robert C. Gooch to Philip Showalter Hench, May 6, 1941
div1.opener:
lb
3115
READING ROOM FILE
May 6, 1941
Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
Your letter of May 2, 1941 has been referred to the
Reading Rooms for attention and report.

We have been unable to locate an entry for Alfredo
Valdes Gallol's Memoria del Hospital Numero Uno ... , Habana,
1902 in our catalog or in the Union Catalog of more than seven
hundred cooperating libraries. It is not in the collections of
the Army Medical Library.

We find that an abstract of the Memoria, with excerpts,
appeared in Boletin Clinico Mensual del Hospital Numero Uno, V. 1,
no. 4, April 1903, pages 101-109. This issue is in our collection
and is available for interlibrary loan. Other issues in our file
are V. 1, nos. 1, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and 10, January 1903 - October
and November 1903. The file will be reserved in the Office of
the Reading Rooms pencing receipt of word as to the use you wish
to make of it.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, Robert C. Gooch
Chief of the Book Services Dr. Philip S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnesota
Mr M. C. Leikind
Science & Technical Ref Ron
Congress 2
